description: Bursting with fresh peaches and sweet raspberries, this berry smoothie recipe is ready in 10 minutes.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Egg free,Video,Raspberry,Summer,Stone fruit,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Tamara,Vegetarian,Vegan,Jan Feb 2021,Dairy free
name: Peach & Raspberry Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small yellow peach, destoned, roughly chopped
1 tbs pistachio kernels (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place peach, raspberries, beetroot, blueberries and pistachios in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blitz until smooth. Serve topped with cacao nibs, extra pistachios, fresh raspberries and strawberries.
